name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: tfile.fs.input.buffer.size
description: Buffer size used for FSDataInputStream in bytes.

name: dfs.qjournal.finalize-segment.timeout.ms
description:
Quorum timeout in milliseconds during finalizing for a specific
    segment.

name: ftp.client-write-packet-size
description: Packet size for clients to write

name: mapreduce.reduce.merge.inmem.threshold
description:
The threshold, in terms of the number of files
  for the in-memory merge process. When we accumulate threshold number of files
  we initiate the in-memory merge and spill to disk. A value of 0 or less than
  0 indicates we want to DON'T have any threshold and instead depend only on
  the ramfs's memory consumption to trigger the merge.

name: dfs.webhdfs.netty.low.watermark
description: Low watermark configuration to Netty for Datanode WebHdfs.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.work.multiplier.per.iteration
description:
*Note*: Advanced property. Change with caution.
    This determines the total amount of block transfers to begin in
    one iteration, for satisfy the policy. The actual number is obtained by
    multiplying this multiplier with the total number of live nodes in the
    cluster. The result number is the number of blocks to begin transfers
    immediately. This number can be any positive, non-zero integer.

name: fs.s3a.multipart.purge.age
description:
Minimum age in seconds of multipart uploads to purge
    on startup if "fs.s3a.multipart.purge" is true
